name: Surator Syandana
description: A Syandana with kick, as robust as Hildryn herself.

languages.description: Ein Syandana mit Kraft, so robust wie Hildryn selbst.
languages.name: Surator Syandana

languages.description: Une Syandana qui a du mordant, aussi robuste que Hildryn elle-même.
languages.name: Syandana Surator

languages.description: Una Syandana con una spinta in più, robusta come Hildryn.
languages.name: Syandana Surator

languages.description: 힐드린 자신만큼이나 강인한 스릴을 선사해 주는 샨다나입니다
languages.name: 서레이터 샨다나

languages.description: Una syandana poderosa, tan resistente como la misma Hildryn.
languages.name: Syandana Surator

languages.description: 够带劲的披饰，像 Hildryn 一样强壮。
languages.name: 雪瑞达披饰

languages.description: Сандана с изюминкой, столь же крепкая, как и сама Хильдрин.
languages.name: Сандана: Суратор

languages.description: 空を駆け巡るシャンダナ。
languages.name: Surator シャンダナ

languages.description: Syandana z kopnięciem, równie krzepka jak Hildryn.
languages.name: Syandana Surator

languages.description: Uma Syandana de peso, tão robusta como a própria Hildryn.
languages.name: Syandana: Surator

languages.description: 夠帶勁的披飾，像 Hildryn 一樣強壯。
languages.name: 雪瑞達披飾

languages.description: นี่คือไซอันดานาที่มาพร้อมความน่าตื่นตา และทนทานพอ ๆ กับ Hildryn
languages.name: ไซอันดานา Surator

languages.description: Enerjik bir Syandana, Hildryn'in kendisi gibi güçlü.
languages.name: Surator Syandana

languages.description: Кремезна сяндана, як і сама Гільдрина.
languages.name: Сяндана «Суратор»
